flawed_nl_solution:
This week, 80 - 20 = <<80-20=50>>50 people watched the first game.
While 80 + 15 = <<80+15=95>>95 people watched the third game.
A total of 80 + 50 + 95 = <<80+50+95=225>>225 people watched the games this week.
Thus, 225 - 200 = <<225-200=25>>25 more people watched the games this week than last week.
#### 25

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 60, not 50. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
